reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is probably one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in. Rooms are extremely nice and big. Breakfast buffet was probabaly one of the best we have ever seen. But, the main two advantages are the location with the fantastic views of the sea, mountains and Etna and the personal service you get from the staff. Its not easy for us to fly often to Taormina because of the distance, but the Timeo is a good reason to make the effort....
reviews.title: Not exceptional

reviews.text: I took my family of 2 sons, their wives, and 3 children, 12,10,and 18 months, and we all had a wonderful time in this beautiful hotel. The staff were extremely helpful and obliging, and the children spent hours in the heated pool. The views were amazing, and we could not have gone anywhere better.
reviews.title: Absolute luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I enjoyed a fantastic long week-end at the Timeo. Architecture, landscaping, location and views are wonderful. The staff are very friendly and have a very positive attitude even during times of stress. While we didn't enjoy the room that much (on two levels, we can climb stairs at home if we want to...), it didn't spoil our experience. The service is very good. Lovely breakfasts on the terrace with excellent views of the volcano. Lunch on the terrace is an experience. Dinner was equally pleasing. We also tried lunch and dinner at the sister hotel Sant Andrea. The quality of service and food matches the Timeo's. And the ambiance is hard to beat. After a fews days away from home we usually look forward to our return, but this time it was different. We would have gladly stayed a few more days.
reviews.title: What an experience
Real 5-star. And then some...
reviews.text: Stayed for 5 nights in 122 (Junior suite plus). Room perfect. Service perfect. But it is all about location, location, location. And this has it in abundance. Breakfast on the terrace viewing the coast and Mt. Etna? You get it. Dinner too? Of course. I'll save time and just say we had no complaints. Front desk and concierge helped with everything and gave great recommendations for dinner and visits even though their own restaurant was superb.

reviews.text: We just returned from a 10 day trip to Sicily spending May 6th thru May 12, 2013 at the Timeo.
reviews.title: Spectacular light lunch and view

reviews.text: I agree completely with my fellow travelers' recent Trip Advisor reviews of the Timeo. Yes, it is "off the charts" in terms of location, service, quality of food, etc. You name it -- it was fantastic. We have been fortunate to stay in many 5 star hotels around the world and Timeo ranks up there for us at the top or as one writer stated, rather -- it should be at the "7 star" level. Signor Funardi, the GM and his team ensure that each guest have an extraordinary experience at their property. Of course, it is a 5 star hotel -- so if one is on a budget, respectfully, you will probably be more comfortable at another property but do stop by to admire the view at a minimum. BTW, we also thought the chef was one of the best in Taormina.
reviews.title: Hotel Timeo, Taormina

reviews.text: You can't fault orient express hotels in general this is our fifth one to try and it doesn't disappoint - the view is breathtaking over the bay and it's a piece of heaven to relax and be spoilt rotten - elegant yet relaxed you won't want to leave as it was my birthday the staff made a special effort special thanks to pancreatzio who runs the pool bar for making it extra special - if you want to spoil yourself or that special someone then GO !
reviews.title: Heavenly

reviews.text: My family and I stayed @ GHT first week in September - Our Junior Suite was large, with a lovely view of the sea. GM - Luca Finardi has an amazing team from housekeeping, front desk, to restaurant - they seem to be genuinely happy to be working there and it shows in there service delivery and interaction with clients. They are exceptional brand ambassadors for the OE brand - kudos to the Timeo Team!
reviews.title: Discrete luxury, comfort and service

reviews.text: If you are contemplating a visit to Taormina don't even consider any other place to stay - select GHT. After dinner, order a cocktail on the terrace and just chill.
